Class AbstractS3ACommitterFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configured

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configurable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DirectoryStagingCommitterFactory, MagicS3GuardCommitterFactory, PartitionedStagingCommitterFactory, S3ACommitterFactory, StagingCommitterFactory

    public abstract class AbstractS3ACommitterFactory
extends org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.lib.output.PathOutputCommitterFactory
    Dynamically create the output committer based on subclass type and settings.

      • getDestinationFileSystem

        protected org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileSystem getDestinationFileSystem(org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path outputPath,
                                                                   org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.JobContext context)
                                                            throws IOException
        Get the destination filesystem, returning null if there is none. Code using this must explicitly or implicitly look for a null value in the response.
        Parameters:
        outputPath - output path
        context - job/task context
        Returns:
        the destination filesystem, if it can be determined
        Throws:
        IOException - if the FS cannot be instantiated

      • createTaskCommitter

        public abstract org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.lib.output.PathOutputCommitter createTaskCommitter(S3AFileSystem fileSystem,
                                                                                               org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path outputPath,
                                                                                               org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.TaskAttemptContext context)
                                                                                        throws IOException
        Implementation point: create a task committer for a specific filesystem.
        Parameters:
        fileSystem - destination FS.
        outputPath - final output path for work
        context - task context
        Returns:
        a committer
        Throws:
        IOException - any problem, including the FS not supporting the desired committer
